section.title: LDAP platform
section.para: Instead of explaining what an LDAP platform is, we show 2 different LDAP platform instances in the following sections. We use the dmsat1 Deployment zone as an example. For security reasons, an extra LDAP instance is available for the subzone dmz. This setup means that all nodes in dmsat1 will use the generic LDAP service of the ldap1 instance. For the nodes in dmz, the generic LDAP settings are overwritten by the subzone parameters.
